title: New problem :(
body: So recently I had been having a lot of bugsplat and fps problems, but I seemed to have fixed them, however after that I now start to get "the blue screen of death" with the stop code: THREAD_STUCK_IN_DEVICE_DRIVER. Nothing I try seems to be working, I have done everything on the Microsoft support pages, but the error still continues. Please help, as this happens atleast once every game, maximum of two (so far).

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please upload your latest minidump file pertaining to this bluescreen, these can be located at **C:\windows\Minidump** by default.

Feel free to upload the file to any host of your choosing.

Apologies for the delayed response.
